p: Currently, remdesivir, used against Ebola, and chloroquine/ hydroxychloroquine, used against malaria (Luo et al., 2020; Yazdany & Kim, 2020), are being used for COVID‐19 patients. Between the submission and revision of this review article, safety concerns have been raised about the chloroquine/hydroxylchloroquine use in COVID‐19, and the discussion is still open (Paliani & Cardona, 2020).
